response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which we believe could significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. This product has been meticulously designed and engineered to meet the highest standards of quality and efficiency. Given its unique features and capabilities, we estimate its worth to be well above $800,000. However, to facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This offer is valid for a limited time only, and I hope we can discuss the details further to explore how this product can contribute to your company's growth and success.", "product_price": 950000}
